main event: On July 21, 1958, five witnesses observed lights in the sky over Wantagh, Long Island, N.Y.
interesting points: The witnesses initially saw five white lights which merged into one larger light as it vanished,The observation lasted for about 10 minutes,The witnesses did not note any audible sounds associated with the sighting,An aircraft approached the area where the object was observed, causing it to vanish,One of the witnesses was identified as a 15-year-old student.
sighted object: initially five white lights that changed into one large light
witness description: a 15-year-old student and five additional companions
